name: Build Adventure
description:
In this game, some parts of the level are missing. Your mission is to go to the end of the level without dying, but be careful, you have a limit of placeable items.

MODES :

The playing mode, which is enabled by default. In this mode, you will only be able to move around in the level.

The building mode, which you can enable by pressing the E key. In this mode, you will be able to place items in the level, but you won’t be able to move around. If the camera is too close or too far away, you can scroll up or down with your mouse wheel to adjust the zoom.
